attributes.action: honour the promise to scrap the toll on QE2 (Dartford Crossing M25) once the crossing was paid for, which happened in 2003.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The current toll fee which admittedly was charged to pay for the construction of the bridge was promised to be scrapped once the crossing was paid for, which apparently happened in 2003. Bearing in mind that this is 2007, surely it is well past the expiry date.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
